attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ever since the Conservatives sold off the Electric companies we have all had to pay the (SOCIAL COST) price. 

Now more than ever we are paying the price of privatization, more than 6 million households struggle to pay their electricity bills. 

The extortionate charges levied on the electricity consumer. And the consequential rising profits the electricity companies make - is a travesty. 

Foreign companies own our electricity companies and they are making Enormous Profits at our expense. 

Is it not time to make a stand and Re-Nationalize the electricity industry. 

It is criminal that these companies can not be properly regulated to the advantage of the British consumer and prices capped at a fair rate. 

The tax revenue for the government is enormous. 

The Government is reluctant to consider Nationalization of electricity because of tax revenue.

But the Government was quick to waste the public money on saving a bank that does little for us as a nation.

We should Nationalize Electricity for the sake of the People. Before we are all left in the Dark.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
